column1: Goal: Convert conference connections into demos, maintain momentum, establish thought leadership

column4: Big picture takeaway from conference - gap between clean and ready data, organizational readiness > technical debt, industry wants a standard
column6: Nina comments on "standard" point; Ben offers to schedule follow-ups

column4: Best technical session - Julia Fox on Semantic Tools. East on the Compass (Semantic Clarity) - ontology mapping as must-have not nice-to-have
column5: Julia Fox session photo or Ontology slide (Page 13-14)
column6: Anuj connects to 4 dimensions; Ben offers intros

column4: 31 conversations, 14 demo requests. Hunger for clear answer to "is our data AI-ready?" - Calendly link for Readiness Audit
column6: Anuj/Nina comment with gratitude and tag people they met

column4: 1) Tech Stack vs Talent Stack gap, 2) Autonomous labs need quality control, 3) CMC is next frontier, 4) Semantic interoperability non-negotiable, 5) Industry wants a standard
column6: Nina adds depth to #2 and #4; Ben adds business context to #5

column4: How to measure ML-readiness: Factor 50 Rule, power analysis, class balance, Shannon entropy, CDD divergence, Theil U, R-value, VIF. AIDRIN framework citation.
column6: Anuj contextualizes for execs; Ben offers to connect technical teams

column4: Hypothesis validated - leaders know they have data readiness problem but cant measure. Scheduling with 3 top-10 pharma, 2 AI-native, 1 CRO. Complimentary Readiness Audits offer.
Revisiting speaker challenge on Statistical Health. Findings: manual measurement, DQ but not ML Readiness, no portfolio-level view. Thanks to Christopher Arendt, Amrik Mahal.
column6: Nina adds technical nuance; Ben highlights business implications

column4: Finding my people - FAIR beyond checkboxes, ontology infra, bias detection before regulatory problems. Launching monthly AI Readiness Coffee Chat - February topic: Measuring Semantic Interoperability
column6: Anuj promotes; Ben connects commercial folks

column4: Final conversion push - what the demo includes: real assessment, 4 dimension scores, prioritized recommendations, audit-ready docs. 30 min, no pitch. Calendly link.
